_source.text: 10) Don't Look Now ( 1974 ) - Nicholas Roeg's adaption of Daphne du Maurier's short story is not a horror story - it's far better than that.

text: 10) Don't **Look** Now ( 1974 ) - Nicholas Roeg's adaption of Daphne du Maurier's short story is not a **horror** story - it's far **better** **than** that.

_source.text: A few journalists were worried when they took a spin on the old F4 and noted that the brakes on the older bike worked better than the new bike we just stepped off of.
